description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.LdYGqI7hDPc9JU4H]{Law Officer}

You know how to cut through red tape and use databases to follow up on clues, find potential suspects, and perform research related to enforcing the law. When sorting through such data, you can complete a task in a fraction of the time it would take most people. It takes you only 10 minutes to attempt a @Check[type:diplomacy] to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C#gather-information]{gather information}, provided you have access to an infosphere, appropriate downloaded data set (Starfinder Core Rulebook 430), or the cooperation of a local law enforcement agency. In addition, once per day while you have access to such advantages, if you fail a @Check[type:culture] to identify a criminal, law-enforcement agent, organization, legal practice, or law, you can reroll the check.
